name: Beroepsvereniging van Zelfstandige financiÃ«le Bemiddelaars
membership: BZB is member of the European Federation of Financial Advisers and Financial Intermediaries (FECIF).
goal: The goal of our organisation is defending the interests of the self-employed financial intermediaries (tied agents banking and investment services and insurance intermediaries).
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
We lobby mostly concerning:
- intermediation in banking and investment services
- MiFID II (selling rules - precontractual information)
- IDD (selling rules - information obligation - professional requirements - registration)
- PRIIPs
